channel.title: Charles Forman. Stuff I write down.

item.title: Importance of limits
item.description: when you build stuff with the passion that could have been, people feel it

item.title: Writing a screenplay in Fountain
item.description: I am writing a screenplay in Fountain. If you are writing a screenplay, I highly recommend using it. Fountain offers not only a great way to write a screenplay, but also flexibility to create new tools to help you conceptualize, visualize, and realize a really great story.

item.title: Everything you wanted to know about Charles.
item.description: My name is Charles and I've been making stuff my whole life. I'm more of a creative person than a technical one. However, I've been accused at being good at both.

item.title: How to contact Charles Forman
item.description: I really want to hear from you! Just want to say hi? Great! Want to chat about ideas? I'd love that. In New York and you want to hang? Sounds good!

item.title: Hey... wanna read my movie treatment?
item.description: I have written a treatment that I could use your feedback on! If you’d like to read it, please email me: charles@setpixel.com

item.title: You should start playing with flying robots
item.description: Multirotor flying robots are more than just a new kind of toy. They represent the convergence of many pieces of tech, and a huge opportunity for innovation that will have application far beyond flying toys.

item.title: I’m making a movie.
item.description: After a lot of thought, I have decided to step down from my job so I can focus my energy on developing a movie. I know this seems like it comes out of left field to some people. However, I think most people will understand that while it’s crazy, I have to make movies for my 10 year old self.

item.title: Why I make Picturelife...
item.description: Like most anyone else, I love my photos. They are incredibly valuable to me. Almost every other week, I hear horrible stories about people have lost their phones. The phone can be replaced but, the photos on it can never be. It's gut wrenching. Even worse, people's entire library of photos have been lost because their hard drive crashed. This should never happen to anyone.

item.title: My Trip to the Mayo Clinic
item.description: After a couple of minor health issues, I decided to get my personal health in order. I decided to go to a three day intensive physical exam at the Mayo Clinic, the best hospital in the world. I left with more questions than answers.

item.title: Charles Forman is a professional dreamer of making the best things possible.
item.description: I founded OMGPOP, a video game company, that developed Draw Something, and ultimately sold to Zynga. I have lived in a few great places: Chicago, Tokyo, Seoul, and New York City. Gawker has called me the most interesting new millionaire playboy in tech. In reality, I’m not all that slick with the ladies and whether or not I am interesting, is debatable. I am currently the founder and CEO of Picturelife, my most important work to date.
